0.title: The Eight Deadly Sins
0.plot: While striving to relax at his local Undead Cafe, vampire Jhonen brushes up on his living dead education by reading the good book of Vampire Deity Alexandra.

imdb.plot outline: Vampire Jhonen is searching for love and happiness while striving to be a Blues musician. His friends include zombies, vampires, witches, a bipolar vampire bat named Killjoy, Mr. Grim Reaper, a Pixie named Jenn, a greedy Goblin and more. They don't make things easy for him. Especially when he strives to get a love life. Wish him luck as you laugh along.
imdb.title: Vampires Need Love Too!
plot: Vampire Jhonen is searching for love and happiness while striving to be a Blues musician. His friends include zombies, vampires, witches, a bipolar vampire bat named Killjoy, Mr. Grim Reaper, a Pixie named Jenn, a greedy Goblin and more. They don't make things easy for him. Especially when he strives to get a love life. Wish him luck as you laugh along.::Brian Cattapan
